result.eng: Would you prefer a cup of tea?
result.html: Arbh fhearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?
result.ponchtml: Arḃ ḟearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?

result.eng: Which would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ga: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.orig: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.html: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ab ḟearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?

result.eng: We prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.
result.ga: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin
result.orig: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin
result.html: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáinWe prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.
result.ponchtml: Is fearr linn fanaċt i mbrúnna ná in óstáinWe prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.

result.html: Is fearr liom tae láidirI prefer strong tea.
result.ponchtml: Is fearr liom tae láidirI prefer strong tea.

result.eng: I hate camping, I prefer hotels.
result.ga: Is fuath liom bheith ag campáil is fearr liom óstáin
result.orig: Is fuath liom bheith ag campáil is fearr liom óstáin
result.html: Is fuath liom bheith ag campáil is fearr liom óstáinI hate camping, I prefer hotels.
result.ponchtml: Is fuaṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag campáil is fearr liom óstáinI hate camping, I prefer hotels.

result.eng: I prefer a house with a washing machine and a dryer.
result.ga: B'fhearr liom teach le hinneall níocháin agus triomadóir ann
result.orig: B'fhearr liom teach le hinneall níocháin agus triomadóir ann
result.html: B'fhearr liom teach le hinneall níocháin agus triomadóir annI prefer a house with a washing machine and a dryer.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr liom teaċ le hinneall níoċáin agus triomadóir annI prefer a house with a washing machine and a dryer.

result.eng: What day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ga: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.orig: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.html: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ponchtml: Cén lá den tseaċtain ab ḟearr liḃ taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?

result.eng: Voters prefer candidates who already have power.
result.ga: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachta
result.orig: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachta
result.html: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachtaVoters prefer candidates who already have power.
result.ponchtml: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a ḃíos i seilḃ na cuṁaċtaVoters prefer candidates who already have power.
